about_the_game:
Halloween 4 Book

This Halloween themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Halloween is back and it's spookier than ever!

Dive into this annual-themed book...if you dare!

Contents

The Halloween 4 book unlocks the following images:

  • Mummy - 58x58
  • Witch Totem - 71x100
  • Cat Pumpkin - 78x57
  • Candy Floss - 85x90
  • Plague Doctor - 88x87
  • Trick or Treat - 99x100
  • Skull - 106x161
  • Crow - 109x107
  • Fancy Dress - 110x40
  • Cauldron - 115x159
  • Banshee - 140x140
  • Mothman - 149x156
  • The Faceless - 150x150
  • Cthulu - 170x199
  • Blood Moon - 170x200
  • Party Drinks - 195x255
  • The Watcher - 200x200
  • Silhouette - 210x191
  • Potions - 235x125
  • Horror Movie Night - 300x161

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.11
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: Coloring Pixels - Halloween 4 Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
